Panicked courtiers wasted no time in turning the Saudi tycoon at the centre of the royal cash for favours storm into a non-person.

articles.author: Rebecca English
articles.title: Duchess of Cornwall becomes patron of Nigeria's first sexual assault referral centre - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Duchess of Cornwall, 74, is set to be announced as royal patron of The Mirabel Centre, a trailblazing organisation in West Africa.
articles.content:
The Duchess of Cornwall has signalled her determination to extend her work on supporting female victims of violence by becoming patron of Nigeria's first sexual assault referral centre.
